sites.name: Joetoep
sites.description: Joetoep is a simple remake of the famous site Youtube. I made it as a fullstack project for school. It is made with basic HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP, and a Mysql database.

sites.name: Elan Office Support
sites.description: Elan Office Support is a site i have made on my first internship. It is made with wordpress.

sites.name: Vimdesk
sites.description: Vimdesk is a big project i have worked on during my second internship. Vimdesk has its own API. I have worked on both the front-end and API. The front-end was made with VueJS and the API with Laravel.
